doctor.name: Dr. Chaity Barua
doctor.specialty: Newborn, Child Diseases & Child Cardiology Specialist
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Chaity Barua, MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Pediatrics), MD (Pediatric Cardiology), is a highly qualified specialist in newborn and child diseases, with expertise in pediatric cardiology. She serves as an Assistant Professor of Pediatric Cardiology at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. Dr. Chaity provides expert care for congenital heart defects, pediatric arrhythmias, rheumatic heart disease, and other heart-related conditions in children. She consults at Medinova Medical Services, Malibagh, located at Gemcon Business Tower, 255 New Circular Road, Dhaka, from 7 PM to 9 PM on Saturdays, Sundays, Tuesdays, and Thursdays. For appointments, call +8801716410062.

chamber.address: Gemcon Business Tower, 255 New Circular Road, Malibagh, Dhaka

doctor.name: Brig. Gen. Prof. Dr. Nurunnahar Fatema Begum
doctor.specialty: Child Heart Diseases Specialist & Interventional Pediatric Cardiologist
doctor.info: Brig. Gen. Prof. Dr. Nurunnahar Fatema Begum is a Pediatric Cardiologist in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS, FRCP, FACC, FSCAI. He is a Professor & Head, Pediatric Cardiology at Combined Military Hospital (CMH), Dhaka. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Labaid Specialized Hospital, Dhanmondi. Practicing hour of Brig. Gen. Prof. Dr. Nurunnahar Fatema Begum at Labaid Specialized Hospital, Dhanmondi is 4pm to 6.30pm (Closed: Friday).

Professor & Head of Pediatric Cardiology Department  at National Institute of Cardiovascular Diseases & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Fair Lab Diagnostic & Consultation Center. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. ABM Abdus Salam at Fair Lab Diagnostic & Consultation Center is 11am to 7pm (Closed: Friday).
